label: 検断権
本: The Kamakura Bakufu:  A Study in Documents . Stanford University Press . 1976
説明文: The right of jurisdiction in criminal matters. This privilege included rights of pursuit, incarceration, judgment, and confiscation. It could be divided among local authorities and central proprietary interests on any basis: by type of crime, by territorial boundaries, or by percentage of any fines levied.
